about.title: About
about.firstDescription: My experience in the scientific field and my passions (teaching, sports and electronics) have gradually made me interested in programming, to the point that my most precious long-term achievement is being able to integrate them into a software project that adds value and allow a problem to be solved.
about.secondDescription: Currently, I have strong experience working on React, Java, and Node.js projects. I've built frontend applications from scratch using microfrontend architecture and have contributed to improving performance and security across several applications.

home.homeDescription: specialized in Javascript, I have done some projects from scratch using NodeJS and Java as backend technologies and ReactJS as frontend technology.

contact.title: Contact
contact.msg: If you think I can add value to your team, you can leave me a message and we will schedule a meeting
